text: Ambrose-Ward Mansion is located in East Orange, Essex County, New Jersey, United States. The mansion was built in 1889 and was added to the National Register of Historic Places on September 20, 1982. ==See also== *National Register of Historic Places listings in Essex County, New Jersey ==References== Category:East Orange, New Jersey Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in New Jersey Category:Houses completed in 1889 Category:Houses in Essex County, New Jersey Category:National Register of Historic Places in Essex County, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Register of Historic Places
title: Ambrose-Ward Mansion
